entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
